summary: Completed comprehensive testing of EZ Trip AI Trip Planner feature. Backend APIs working correctly, frontend UI functional, weather integration operational, and form validation working. Minor issues with form validation feedback and flights checkbox behavior.

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: LLM processing can take 15+ seconds causing timeouts
flaky_endpoints.workaround: Increase timeout or implement async processing

ui_bugs.issue: No visible error message when destination is empty and generate button is clicked
Departure city input doesn't appear consistently after checking flights checkbox

passed_tests: Landing page loads with EZ Trip branding
Google sign-in button present on landing page
Dashboard loads correctly with authenticated session
AI Trip Planner card displays on dashboard with correct content
AI Trip Planner navigation from dashboard works
Trip Planner page loads at /planner route
Backend /api/planner/generate endpoint exists and responds
Backend /api/planner/save endpoint works
Backend /api/planner/saved endpoints work
Weather API integration works (Open-Meteo geocoding)
Weather API forecast data retrieval works
Form fields work correctly (destination, dates, travelers, budget, accommodation)
Interest selection buttons work
Generate trip plan button triggers API call
Loading indicator appears during plan generation
All core SplitEase functionality remains intact
Backend API root endpoint works
Currencies endpoint returns correct data
Authentication system works properly
Trip CRUD operations work
Expense operations work
Refund operations work
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix form validation feedback for empty destination field and improve flights checkbox behavior to consistently show departure city input. Consider implementing async processing for LLM endpoints to handle longer processing times.
